channel.title: {PKSX} Project PKScapeX {Ryan} MUST READ
channel.description:
[b]Welcome to PKScapeX ~ Truely one of the best PK & Non PK Servers[/b]
PKScapeX BETA Testing Start Date: [i]Sunday, 29th July.[/i] PKScapeX Public Opening Date: [i]Saturday, 5th August.[/i]
[b]Technical Details About PKScapeX[/b]
PKScapeX is hosted on a VPS payed for personally by me. 960MB Ram is dedicated to PKScapeX 200 Players can play with no lag, i'm fixing it up so it can hold 400! A 3.0Ghz Processor makes great game play. The server will be restarted every 1 hour The server will be up 24/7/365, yes ALL THE TIME!
[b]Information about the Server[/b]
It will be focused on pking for fun, so mostly pkers will enjoy the server, but believe me this server will have so much more to do.
Full Fletching (99%, Interfaces done except Make X) Full Firemaking (100%) Full Woodcutting (100%) Full Mining (100%) Full Smelting (95%, Just have to to the finishing touches) Full Smithing (45%, Quite a bit more to do to make it perfect) Full Runecrafting (85%, A little bit left to do) Full Agility (85%, Again, just a little bit left to do) Full Farming (70%, Started, just not finished, not hard to finish though) Full Combat (60%, Mainly done, just have to focus on bonuses and timers now) Full NPC Training (75%, A fair bit left to do, done most of it though) Full Fishing (95%, A tiny bit left to do) Full Cooking (75%, Trying to do interfaces ATM)
More Information on the Server.
Runecrafting - To runecraft, you must tele to edgeville using an amulet of glory, get your ess etc, go into the wilderness to the Zammy Mage and talk to him to get to the abyss, you then enter the altar of your choice, and craft your runes at the altar, i suspect some people will want to run natures like on real RuneScape.
Full Economy - Rare can NOT be bought anywhere, and only from official drop partys, and a 1/300 chance drop from the Chaos Elemental, which will definately require a team as it hits multiple people, teleing them around it, and removing its weapons. All armour must be smithed by mining the rocks, smelting the bars and making them, requiring mining/smithing levels, or by killing monsters and getting the drops, eg. Kalphite Queen for Dragon Chain, dust devils for Dragon Weapons, and metal drag's for misc. Dragon Armour. Green, Blue, Red & Black dragons for rune armour, and lower level monsters for lower level armour and weapons.
Spells require runes, and runes must be made by Runecrafting, although basic runes like elemental runes can be bought from the Zammy Mage or Aubury.
The only available magic is the ancient magics, although some spells will be differant, for example teleports will lead to special dungeons and require slayer, magic and other level requirements to use. To train magic from level one, you can use the magic training arena, which requires runes to do certain things, and for every 10 points you get, you recieve a CastleWars Ticket which can be traded for Infinity Armour, but will require alot of tickets, eg. 1000 for an Infinity Robe top, 900 for Infinity Robe Bottoms, etc.
Range can be trained by smithing or buying knifes, darts, bolts etc, and buying or fletching bows, crossbows, etc. A rare drop from Smoke Devils will be the Seercull, AKA Dark Bow, which hits TWICE each Hit.
And much more, which will be explained elsewhere.
[b]Server Staff[/b]
PKScapeX Admins
~Ryan {Owner} ~Kye
PKScapeX Moderators
~CodyX
[b]Coding Staff[/b]
~Ryan {Owner}
10 Spaces Available
[b]PKScapeX BETA Testers[/b]
~CodyX
15 Spaces Available
[b]Pictures[/b]
[img]http://www.uploadz.co.uk/671.png[/img]
[img]http://www.uploadz.co.uk/8332.png[/img]
[img]http://www.uploadz.co.uk/6763.png[/img]
[img]http://www.uploadz.co.uk/734.png[/img]
[img]http://www.uploadz.co.uk/3855.png[/img]
[img]http://www.uploadz.co.uk/5326.png[/img]
[b]Extra Information[/b]
Wow, this has taken me 45 Minutes to write, i really hope you appreciate it!
The forum URL is www.PKScape.net/forum and a main site will be coming shortly ;D
Thanks alot, Ryan, AKA Stanyer.
To contact me on MSN ~ stanyer7@hotmail.co.uk
